org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred

Class AccumuloOutputFormat.AccumuloRecordWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AccumuloOutputFormat.AccumuloRecordWriter
  • Enclosing class:
    AccumuloOutputFormat

    protected static class AccumuloOutputFormat.AccumuloRecordWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class to be used to create RecordWriter instances that write to Accumulo.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(Text table,
                  Mutation mutation)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Push a mutation into a table. If table is null, the defaultTable will be used. If AccumuloOutputFormat.canCreateTables(JobConf) is set, the table will be created if it does not exist. The table name must only contain alphanumerics and underscore.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
